on_message.verify_begin: Sorry, your account must be {0} or older in order to get verified. Please either verify with your phone number or contact the mod team through <@{1}}> (Moderator mail, top of the member list) for manual verification if you're unable to verify with a phone number.
on_message.verify_done: You have been verified. Please remember to read the <#{0}>. You may also assign yourself roles in <#{1}>. If you ever have an issue, do not hesitate to message <@{2}> (Moderator Mail, top of the member list)
on_message.verify_abort: You're already able to speak in the server, there is no need for you to get verified. Contact <@{0}> (Moderator Mail, top of the member list) if there is an issue.

birthday.role_add: Gave the Birthday {0} role to <@{1}>. Automatically removing it in {2}
